mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notes (user_id, source, title, content, comment, tags, status, created_at, ingested_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{source}, #{title}, #{content}, #{comment}, #{tags}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{ingestedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE notes SET user_id = #{userId}, source = #{source}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, comment = #{comment}, tags = #{tags}, status = #{status}, created_at = #{createdAt}, ingested_at = #{ingestedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notes WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM notes ORDER BY created_at DESC
